answers.answer: I have a question ,When a woman is pregnent , when she gives birth to a baby , there are stem cells , which are collected from the ambilicale cord of the baby , they say , these stem cells can be used to generate any organ of the body , as the baby is born from these stem cells , can these stem cells be used for the mother , and can it be used for juvenile diabetic mother , can these cells be used for pancerias .....?Any success stories around the world .....?REgards,Dipen
I'm not too sure but I hope so ! I'm a type 1 diabetic and 16 snd waiting for thid cure to come along

question: hi friends,I have a question ,When a woman is pregnent , when she gives birth to a baby , there are stem cells , which are collected from the ambilicale cord of the baby , they say , these stem cells can be used to generate any organ of the body , as the baby is born from these stem cells , can these stem cells be used for the mother , and can it be used for juvenile diabetic mother , can these cells be used for pancerias .....?Any success stories around the world .....?REgards,Dipen
title: stem cells can treat juvenile diabetes
